amendment.description: To transfer custody of the Air Force Health Study assets to the Medical Follow-up Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4393 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4393 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S6377-6392) To transfer custody of the Air Force Health Study assets to the Medical Follow-up Agency.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4393 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4393 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka.
